valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 7 Nov 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 8 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Bailey 991 loses its identity by 1800 Friday. New Atlantic low expected just west of Bailey 988 by same time
